attributes.action: Help our child learn to swim affordably
attributes.additional_details: There are deaths every year related to youngster's swimming in unknown waters
attributes.background: Heavily subsidise all swimming pools and lessons and ensure all children have swimming lessons to learn a valuable life skill

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you want the Government to subsidise swimming lessons or all swimming for children. 
 
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
